text: the lower lower worm is a parasite that
can cause severe joint pain and even
death in central Africa the worm also
creates a problem for health officials
who are trying to prevent infections
with other parasites that's because a
low a low infection can cause severe
reactions to the drugs used to prevent
those other parasites this new tool
called the CellScope Lowa can avoid that
problem it's made using 3d printed parts
and uses the camera on a regular iPhone
turning it into a video microscope in
less than 2 minutes it can identify
someone carrying low Aloha all it needs
is a drop of blood a finger prick will
do then it takes video of the blood and
software locates the invisible worms
looking for their unique wriggling
pattern as they push red blood cells
around this offers a potentially cheap
and easy way to test patients on the
spot and prevent giving them treatments
that could have serious consequences
you
